content: is crocheted in row using faux fur yarn chain 51 row 1  single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook single_crochet across chain 1 and turn row 2 row 11  single_crochet across chain 1 and turn row 12  15 single_crochet 2 single_crochet decrease x2 single_crochet decrease single_crochet decrease 2 single_crochet x2 15 single_crochet chain 1 and turn row 13  single_crochet across chain 1 and turn row 14  15 single_crochet single_crochet decrease x3 decrease single_crochet x2 15 single_crochet chain 1 and turn row 15  single_crochet across chain 1 and turn row 16  15 single_crochet 5 decrease 15 single_crochet chain 1 and turn row 17  15 single_crochet decrease single_crochet decrease 15 single_crochet chain 1 and turn row 18  15 single_crochet sc3tog 15 single_crochet fo leave tail for sewing back of hood together  assembly instructions  after sewing the back of the hoods to complete the hood shape place the inner hood into the outer and adjust your placement use stitch markers to keep it in place and sew around the outer edge of the inside hood using lilac yarn for the gem sew the rec circle on top of the black one lightly stuff with poly-fil and sew onto hood sew ear accent onto ear and lightly stuff ears and fur tufts with poly-fil and secure to hood with stitch markers and sew them on where you think looks best  © 2022 paris nagy-bergeron all rights reserved this pattern is for personal use only the pattern or parts of it may not be reproduced distributed or resold translated published altered shared or posted for sale or free over the internet or offline you can sell items made from this pattern provided they are handmade by yourself in a limited number and you give credit to the designer please add the following lines to your item description and any item you are selling this item is handmade by your name from a design and pattern by paris nagy-bergeron @parispurdyknots
